A text log column kind.

## Variants
#### `Timeline` = 1
Type: [`Utf8`](../datatypes/utf8.md)

A specific timeline's column.

#### `EntityPath` = 2
Type: `null`

Column for which entity path this was logged to.

#### `LogLevel` = 3
Type: `null`

Column for log-level.

#### `Body` = 4
Type: `null`

The text message the log has.
